name: Morugarde
quote: The scourge of the undead once, now? There's a reason cremation's become preferable.

name: Ravendraught
quote: Bone speakers playing at merchants. Those ravens are not simply aesthetic.

name: Viridescent Vigil
quote: Older than most nations and among the first druids in existence. Needest thou a guide in the realm of faerie, they are it.

name: Sternbough
quote: At journey's end, he found it, home, beyond the Mountain of Eld.

name: Greygong
quote: Their fault was the same as any of our kind, they dug too deep.

name: Muugningar
quote: They don't exist, of course. A mere rumor, but should one go missing in the night...

name: University of the Arcane
leaders: Principal & Faculty picked by Aerosi monarchy.
quote: No finer place to study, 'cept perhaps Sanctuary, closer though, and in the capital no less.

name: Sanctuary
quote: A university on a remote island, where the faculty continously disappears for extra-planar research expeditions? You had me at island.

name: Mycelian Alliance
quote: Pirates. That's all they are. No more, no less. I want them removed from our waters.
